name: NeoDodgeball
description:
NeoDodgeball is a twin-stick, top down, multiplayer dodgeball game with a neon aesthetic. You can play with two or four players in a variety of game modes and 5 unique characters with their own special abilities and stats. 

#multiplayer #sports #arcade #localmultiplayer #twinstick #topdown#action #retro 

-Controller support only (Xinput)
-No Music as of now
-Minimal Sound effects

CONTROLS:
Left Stick = Move
Right Stick = Aim
A = Ability
LT = Grab
LT (With Ball) = Parry
RT(Press) = Charge Throw
RT(Release) = Release Throw
DPad = Menu Navigation
Start = Pause
